name: Silver-Gold Bracelet
description: Silver bracelet in the shape of a penny with a diameter of 10mm.Available in three shades, silver, gold and rose gold, it is 18cm long and weighs 4 grams.

name: Onyx Bracelet
description: Semi-fixed silver bracelet with natural faceted onyx, weighing 67 grams.

name: Mystic Topaz Bracelet
description: Silver bracelet with three mystical topaz semi-precious stones on a cubic zirconia mount. The bracelet is 19 cm long and weighs 18 grams.

name: Original Zultanite Bracelet
description: Silver bracelet with three original zultanite semi-precious stones on a cubic zirconia mount. The bracelet is 18 cm long and weighs 14 grams.

name: Lapis-Lazuli Earrings
description: Silver earrings with natural semi-precious stones, lapis lazuli and moonstone. The earrings have a screw closure system and 4 grams.

name: Life Tree Earrings
description: Silver earrings symbolizing the Tree of Life adorned with small colored cubic zirconia. The earrings have a classic closure system and 3 grams.

name: Natural Turcoaz Earrings
description: Silver earrings with a small natural turquoise cube. The earrings are 8mm, 'African hook' closure system and 7 grams.

name: Original Zultanite Earrings
description: Silver earrings with natural semi-precious stones from zultanite and cubic zirconia. The earrings have a classic closing system and 6 grams.

name: Special Fancy Ring
description: Special model of silver ring with multiple colored semi-precious stones on a mount with a special appearance.

name: Classic Ring with Turquoise
description: Silver ring with a slightly antiqued look and a natural oval turquoise.

name: Vintage Ring with natural Green Stone
description: Vintage silver ring with a natural semi-precious stone having an intense green hue.

name: Natural Zultanite Silver Ring
description: Silver ring with an oval natural zultanite semi-precious stone.
